subject: Mathematics
question_text: Given below are two statements: one is labelled as Assertion(A) and the other is labelled as Reason (R). : In Vernier calliper if positive zero error exists, then while taking measurements, the reading taken will be more than the actual reading. Reason (R) : The zero error in Vernier Calliper might have happened due to manufacturing defect or due to rough handling.
